text:
@realDonaldTrump This is your priority while the country rages with a pandemic? 

At the same time that numbers are climbing,  you choose to close testing centers and reduce funding in related areas.  

Wtf is wrong with you? 

#TrumpVirus 
#TrumpKillsUS 
#COVID19 

https://t.co/tyRkO2tsBx
